    public void createAccount() throws SQLException {    Account account = new Account();    account.createName();    account.createGender();    account.createPasswd();    account.createBalance();    account.createXianE();    // éšæœºç”Ÿæˆ3ä¸ª3ä½æ•°å­—    Random ran = new Random();    int ID1 = ran.nextInt(100, 1000);    int ID2 = ran.nextInt(100, 1000);    int ID3 = ran.nextInt(100, 1000);    String ID = "" + ID1 + ID2 + ID3;    Integer uID = Integer.parseInt(ID);    account.setuID(uID);    Connection conn;    {        try {            conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url, user, password);            PreparedStatement ps;            {                try {                    String sql = "insert into account (uid,userName,gender, passwd, balance, xianE) values ( ?,?, ?, ?, ?, ?)";                    ps = conn.prepareStatement(sql);                    ps.setString(1, String.valueOf(account.getuID()));                    ps.setString(2, account.getUserName());                    ps.setString(3, account.getGender());                    ps.setString(4, account.getPasswd());                    ps.setDouble(5, account.getBalance());                    ps.setDouble(6, account.getXianE());                    ps.executeUpdate();                }; catch (SQLException e) {                    throw new RuntimeException(e);                };                try {                    ps.close();                    conn.close();                }; catch (SQLException e) {                    throw new RuntimeException(e);                };            };        }; catch (SQLException e) {            throw new RuntimeException(e);        };    };    System.out.println("æ³¨å†ŒæˆåŠŸï¼");    System.out.println(account);    System.out.println("å³å°†è¿”å›ä¸»ç•Œé¢...");};

import java.awt.*;public class Bg {    // å…³å¡æ•°    static int level = 1;    // ç›®æ ‡å¾—åˆ†    int goal = (level * 500) + 550;    // æ€»åˆ†    static int count = 0;    // è¯æ°´æ•°é‡    static int waterNum = 3;    // è¯æ°´çŠ¶æ€    static boolean waterFlag = false;    // å¼€å§‹æ—¶é—´    long startTime;    // ç»“æŸæ—¶é—´    long endTime;    // è¯æ°´ä»·æ ¼    int price = (int) (Math.random() * 10);    // æ˜¯å¦è¿›å…¥å•†åº— fä¸è´­ä¹°    boolean shop = false;    // è½½å…¥å›¾ç‰‡    Image bg = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("imgs/bg.jpg");    Image bg1 = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("imgs/bg1.jpg");    Image peo = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("imgs/peo.png");                drawWord(g, 60, Color.red, "æ¸¸æˆè§„åˆ™ï¼š", 100, 500);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®æ”¾å‡ºæŠ“é’©", 100, 560);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "æŠ“ä½é‡‘å—æˆ–çŸ³å¤´å¯ä»¥ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡å³é”®", 100, 620);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "ä½¿ç”¨â€œå¤§åŠ›ç¥è¯â€å¿«é€Ÿæ”¶å›é‡‘å—æˆ–è€…çˆ†ç ´çŸ³å¤´", 100, 680);                break;            case 1:                g.drawImage(peo, 310, 50, null);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "åˆ†æ•°ï¼š" + count, 30, 150);                g.drawImage(water, 550, 40, null);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "Ã—" + waterNum, 610, 90);                // å…³å¡æ•°&ç›®æ ‡å¾—åˆ†                drawWord(g, 20, Color.black, "å…³å¡ï¼š" + level, 30, 60);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "ç›®æ ‡ï¼š" + goal, 30, 115);                // å®æ—¶èµ‹å€¼                endTime = System.currentTimeMillis();                long time = 20 - (endTime - startTime) / 1000;                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "æ—¶é—´ï¼š" + (time > 0 ? time : 0), 520, 150);                break;            case 2:                g.drawImage(water, 330, 380, null);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "ä»·æ ¼ï¼š" + price, 300, 500);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "æ˜¯å¦è´­ä¹°â€œå¤§åŠ›ç¥è¯â€ï¼Ÿ", 280, 550);                drawWord(g, 30, Color.black, "ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®ç¡®è®¤è´­ä¹°ï¼Œå³é”®é€€å‡ºå•†åº—", 100, 700);                                if (shop) {                    count = count - price;                    waterNum++;                    shop = false;                    GameWin.state = 1;                    startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();                };                break;            case 3:                drawWord(g, 80, Color.cyan, "å¤±è´¥", 300, 350);                drawWord(g, 80, Color.black, "åˆ†æ•°ï¼š" + count, 200, 450);                drawWord(g, 60, Color.black, "ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹", 90, 550);                break;            case 4:                drawWord(g, 80, Color.red, "æ­å–œè¿‡å…³", 250, 350);                drawWord(g, 80, Color.black, "åˆ†æ•°ï¼š" + count, 200, 450);                drawWord(g, 60, Color.black, "ç‚¹å‡»é¼ æ ‡å·¦é”®é‡æ–°å¼€å§‹", 90, 550);                break;            default:        };    };    // tå€’è®¡æ—¶å®Œæˆï¼Œfæœªå®Œæˆå€’è®¡æ—¶    boolean gameTime() {        long time = (endTime - startTime) / 1000;        if (time >= 20) {            return true;        };        return false;    };    // é‡ç½®å…ƒç´     void reGame() {        // å…³å¡æ•°        level = 1;        // ç›®æ ‡å¾—åˆ†        goal = (level * 500) + 550;        // æ€»åˆ†        count = 0;        // è¯æ°´æ•°é‡        waterNum = 3;        // è¯æ°´çŠ¶æ€        waterFlag = false;    };    // ç»˜åˆ¶å­—ç¬¦ä¸²    public static void drawWord(Graphics g, int size, Color color, String str, int x, int y) {        g.setColor(color);        g.setFont(new Font("å®‹ä½“", Font.BOLD, size));        g.drawString(str, x, y);    };};

â€œèƒŒæ™¯ç±»â€ä¸­å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ¨çª—å£ä¸Šçš„å†…å®¹ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬èƒŒæ™¯ã€æ–‡å­—ç­‰ä¿¡æ¯

2. â€œçº¿â€ï¼ˆLine.javaï¼‰

import java.awt.*;public class Line {    // èµ·ç‚¹åæ ‡    int x = 380;    int y = 180;    // ç»ˆç‚¹åæ ‡    int endx = 500;    int endy = 500;    // çº¿æ®µé•¿åº¦    double length = 100;    double MIN_length = 100;    double MAX_length = 750;    double n = 0;    // æ–¹å‘    int dir = 1;    // çŠ¶æ€: 0æ‘‡æ‘†ï¼Œ1æŠ“å–ï¼Œ2å›æ”¶ï¼Œ3æŠ“å–è¿”å›    int state = 0;    // é’©çˆª    Image hook = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("imgs/hook.png");    GameWin frame;    Line(GameWin frame) {        this.frame = frame;    };    // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦æŠ“å–æˆåŠŸ    void logic() {        for (Object obj : this.frame.objectList) {            if (endx > obj.x && endx < obj.x + obj.width && endy > obj.y && endy < obj.y + obj.height) {                state = 3;                obj.flag = true;            };        };    };    // ç»˜åˆ¶æ–¹æ³•    void lines(Graphics g) {        endx = (int) (x + length * Math.cos(n * Math.PI));        endy = (int) (y + length * Math.sin(n * Math.PI));        g.setColor(Color.red);        g.drawLine(x - 1, y - 1, endx - 1, endy);        g.drawLine(x, y, endx, endy);        g.drawLine(x + 1, y + 1, endx + 1, endy);        g.drawImage(hook, endx - 36, endy - 2, null);    };    void paintSelf(Graphics g) {        logic();        switch (state) {            case 0:                if (n < 0.1) {                    dir = 1;                }; else if (n > 0.9) {                    dir = -1;                };                n = n + 0.02 * dir;                lines(g);                break;            case 1:                if (length < MAX_length) {                    length = length + 50;                    lines(g);                }; else {                    state = 2;                };                break;            case 2:                if (length > MIN_length) {                    length = length - 50;                    lines(g);                }; else {                    state = 0;                };                break;            case 3:                int m = 1;                if (length > MIN_length) {                    length = length - 20;                    lines(g);                    for (Object obj : this.frame.objectList) {                        if (obj.flag) {                            m = obj.m;                            obj.x = endx - obj.getWidth() / 2;                            obj.y = endy;                            if (length <= MIN_length) {                                obj.x = -150;                                obj.y = -150;                                obj.flag = false;                                Bg.waterFlag = false;                                // åŠ åˆ†                                Bg.count += obj.count;                                state = 0;                            };                            if (Bg.waterFlag) {                                if (obj.type == 1) {                                    m = 1;                                };                                if (obj.type == 2) {                                    obj.x = -150;                                    obj.y = -150;                                    obj.flag = false;                                    Bg.waterFlag = false;                                    state = 2;                                };                            };                        };                    };                };                try {                    Thread.sleep(m);                }; catch (InterruptedException e) {                    e.printStackTrace();                };                break;            default:        };    };    // é‡ç½®çº¿    void reGame() {        n = 0;        length = 100;    };};

import javax.swing.*;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.MouseAdapter;import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;import java.util.ArrayList;import java.util.List;public class GameWin extends JFrame {    // 0æœªå¼€å§‹ï¼Œ1è¿è¡Œä¸­ï¼Œ2å•†åº—ï¼Œ3å¤±è´¥ï¼Œ4èƒœåˆ©    static int state = 0;    // å­˜å‚¨é‡‘å—ã€çŸ³å—    List<Object> objectList = new ArrayList<>();    Bg bg = new Bg();    Line line = new Line(this);    {        // æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥æ”¾ç½®        boolean isPlace = true;        for (int i = 0; i < 11; i++) {            double random = Math.random();            Gold gold; // å­˜æ”¾å½“å‰ç”Ÿæˆçš„é‡‘å—            if (random < 0.3) {                gold = new GoldMini();            }; else if (random < 0.7) {                gold = new Gold();            }; else {                gold = new GoldPlus();            };            for (Object obj : objectList) {                if (gold.getRec().intersects(obj.getRec())) {                    // ä¸å¯æ”¾ç½®                    isPlace = false;                };            };            if (isPlace) {                objectList.add(gold);            }; else {                isPlace = true;                i--;            };        };        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {            Rock rock = new Rock();            for (Object obj : objectList) {                if (rock.getRec().intersects(obj.getRec())) {                    isPlace = false;                };            };            if (isPlace) {                objectList.add(rock);            }; else {                isPlace = true;                i--;            };        };    };    Image offScreenImage;    void launch() {        this.setVisible(true);        this.setSize(768, 1000);        this.setLocationRelativeTo(null);        this.setTitle("é»„é‡‘çŸ¿å·¥");        setDefaultCloseOperation(EXIT_ON_CLOSE);        addMouseListener(new MouseAdapter() {            @Override            public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {                super.mouseClicked(e);                switch (state) {                    case 0:                        if (e.getButton() == 3) {                            state = 1;                            bg.startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();                        };                        break;                    case 1:                        if (e.getButton() == 1 && line.state == 0) {                            line.state = 1;                        };                        if (e.getButton() == 3 && line.state == 3 && Bg.waterNum > 0) {                            Bg.waterFlag = true;                            Bg.waterNum--;                        };                        break;                    case 2:                        if (e.getButton() == 1) {                            bg.shop = true;                        };                        if (e.getButton() == 3) {                            state = 1;                            bg.startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();                        };                        break;                    case 3:                    case 4:                        if (e.getButton() == 1) {                            state = 0;                            bg.reGame();                            line.reGame();                        };                        break;                    default:                };            };        };);        // çº¢çº¿æ‘‡æ‘†        while (true) {            repaint();            nextLevel();            try {                Thread.sleep(50);            }; catch (InterruptedException e) {                e.printStackTrace();            };        };    };    // ä¸‹ä¸€å…³    public void nextLevel() {        if (bg.gameTime() && state == 1) {            if (Bg.count >= bg.goal) {                if (Bg.level == 10) {                    state = 4;                }; else {                    state = 2;                    Bg.level++;                };            }; else {                state = 3;            };            dispose();            GameWin gameWin1 = new GameWin();            gameWin1.launch();        };    };    @Override    public void paint(Graphics g) {        offScreenImage = this.createImage(768, 1000);        Graphics gImage = offScreenImage.getGraphics();        bg.paintSelf(gImage);        if (state == 1) {            // ç»˜åˆ¶é‡‘å—ã€çŸ³å—            for (Object obj : objectList) {                obj.paintSelf(gImage);            };            // ç»˜åˆ¶çº¢çº¿            line.paintSelf(gImage);        };        g.drawImage(offScreenImage, 0, 0, null);    };    public static void main(String[] args) {        GameWin game = new GameWin();        game.launch();    };};
